relationships.description: Harry is being chased by Snap e, as indicated by the cry of 'Legilimens!' and Harry's frantic attempt to clear his mind.
Harry is inside the Department of Mysteries, where he is being chased by Snap e.
After running through a black door, Harry finds himself inside a circular room.
